examples.example: 每天我都开开心心地去上课，在知识的海洋中畅游。

translate.english: Every day I go to class happily and swim freely in the ocean of knowledge.

examples.example: 同学们都精神饱满地去上课，积极投入到知识的探索中。

translate.english: Students all go to class full of energy and actively engage in the exploration of knowledge.

examples.example: 我兴高采烈地去上课，满怀期待地汲取知识的养分。

translate.english: I go to class happily and expectantly absorb the nourishment of knowledge.
